message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about bird anatomy and behavior. Birds, like chickadees, use their beaks to catch prey. Option (B) is incorrect because glass flamingos are not real birds and do not have beaks. Option (C) is incorrect because chicks are baby birds and do not typically catch prey. Option (C) is incorrect because chicks are baby birds and do not have developed beaks for catching prey. Option (D) is incorrect because plastic parrots are not living organisms and do not catch prey.
